snippet: Clarence D. Mumford Sr., a former assistant principal in Memphis, was sentenced to seven years in prison for orchestrating a scheme to help teachers cheat on certification exams.
abstract: Former Memphis teacher and assistant principal Clarence D Mumford Sr is sentenced to seven years in federal prison for orchestrating scheme to help teachers cheat on certification exams.
lead_paragraph: Clarence D. Mumford Sr., a former assistant principal in Memphis, was sentenced to seven years in prison for orchestrating a scheme to help teachers cheat on certification exams.

headline.seo: Mumford Gets 7 Years for Memphis Cheating Scheme
headline.main: Leader of Teachers’ Cheating Ring in Memphis Gets 7-Year Term
headline.print_headline: Leader of Teachers’ Cheating Ring in Memphis Gets 7-Year Term
